util/

hiihat_get_mean_spectrum.pro


top source hiihat_get_mean_spectrum

util

hiihat_get_mean_spectrum, pixels, mean_spectrum=fltarr(nb) [, bad_pixels=fix] [, zero_pixels=fix]

Calculates the mean spectrum from a set of pixels, detecting bad (infinite) and zeroed pixels

Parameters

pixels in required type=fltarr(n,nb)

set of n input pixels of dimension nb

Keywords

mean_spectrum out required type=fltarr(nb)

output mean spectrum

bad_pixels out optional type=fix

number of bad pixels

zero_pixels out optional type=fix

number of zeroed pixels

Author information

Author:

David Ray Thompson and Brian D. Bue
